Source: R/RunQTL.R
RunQTL.Rd

Run a QTL based on a pre-defined or custom workflow outside of Make_Snapshot() or Study_Assess(). This is a helper function that makes it possible to run a QTL for any supported *_Assess function.

RunQTL(strName = NULL, lWorkflow = NULL, lData = NULL, lMapping = NULL)

Arguments

strName

character Name of QTL YAML file found in inst/workflow/experimental, e.g. "qtl0003"

lWorkflow

character Optional. Custom workflow to use in place of pre-defined workflow.

lData

list List of data needed to run QTL analysis.

lMapping

list List of data-domain mappings.

Value

list list of QTL analysis results.

Examples

qtl <- RunQTL("qtl0004")

Contents

Developed by George Wu, Jeremy Wildfire, Matt Roumaya, Nathan Kosiba, Douglas Sanders, Spencer Childress, Li Ge, Zhongkai Wang, Colleen McLaughlin, Chelsea Dickens, Maya Gans, Jacob Anderson.
